bibl.title: State of Nebraska Department of Insurance Summary of Insurance Business in Nebraska

body.seg: State of Nebraska DEPARTMENT OF INSURANCE Summary of Insurance Business in Nebraska for the Year 1942 Also Comparative Figures of Authorized Companies ) for the Years 1939, 1940, 1941

To His Excellency, Governor Dwight Griswold: We respectfully submit the summary of business of companies auth - orized to write insurance in this State for the year ending December 31 VM-1. DEPARTMENT OF INSURANCE, C. C. Fraizer, Director

PHILIPPINE ISLANDS i '.V' V \ Zones shown ore for purpose of Convention Examinations. Light face fleures in respective States indicate Nebraska Com - panies writing in that State. Bold face figures in respective States indicate Companies domiciled in that State writing in Nebraska. Where but one figure appears indicates Nebraska Companies writing in that State. 32 Nebraska Companies N-- write in other States. Figures in map compiled as of Dec. 81. 1942.
